"Battery can't be lower than 20% before backup starts"

It is recommended to back up immediately to avoid data loss

"The backup has been encrypted, please log into the Flyme account to recover it
Flyme account:"
Remark can contain no more than 10 characters

"1. Back up the data and check its backup path. 2. Connect the phone to a PC and open its directory. 3. Copy the backup file from the backup path onto the PC. 4. Connect the new phone to the PC and open its directory. 5. Copy the backup file into any directory on the new phone. 6. Open Backup & Restore on the new phone, then select the backup file to start restoring."

"1. Insert an SD card into this phone. 2. Back up the data. 3. Remove the SD card and insert it into the new device. 4. Open Backup & Restore on the new phone, then select the backup file to start restoring."
Migrating data in Vault will overwrite the new phone’s Vault data
No SD card detected. To restore data onto this device, you can transfer backup files to it from your old phone using a SD card or a PC.
Migrated WeChat data will overwrite existing WeChat data on new phone
The backup failed, SD card memory is not detected
Insufficient space on internal storage. The backup file will be saved to SD card
